text: Kaya tyanni pahile nahi ki amhi tyancyapurvi kityeka janasamuhanna nasta karuna takale, jyanna amhi ya jagata evadhe samarthya pradana kele hote tase tumhalahi pradana kele nahi ani amhi tyancyavara musaladhara pa'usa padala ani amhi tyancya khaluna jalapravaha jari kele, maga amhi tyanna tyancya aparadhampayi barabada karuna takale ani tyancyanantara dusara janasamuha nirmana kela
